data.name: WTC : Recruitment Day Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the first scene from the full version.

After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible. For once, Grendel's lack of attention to security protocols in "The Council Of The Unseen" may have prevented further problems.

Grendel Jinx is voiced by "Sarah"
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
